Archer.desc: Shoots a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deals high damage over a large area. (Self-damage for 10% of your DPS)
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a bow.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb by 10.
Hitting a mob directly with Arrow Bomb will shatter its heart and deal additional damage.
Doubles Main Attack arrows and reduces their damage by 30%. (harder to hit far enemies)
Throw yourself backward to avoid danger. (Hold shift while escaping to cancel)
Your Main Attack arrows have increased speed and knockback.
Shoots a stream of 8 arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them away.
Reduce the Mana cost of Escape by 5.
Forms a shield around you that deals damage and knocks away mobs when they touch it. (3 Charges)
Casting Escape grants a 20% speed buff for 120 seconds to you and nearby players.
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks
Increases your base damage from all Water attacks
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks
Doubles the speed of Arrow Storm and shoots +6 arrows per stream.
When Arrow Shield loses its last charge, spew 150 arrows around you to rain down on enemies.
Hitting an enemy with Arrow Storm will create an area that slows them down and deals damage every 0.4s.
Arrow Bomb will leave a trail of fire for 6s. (3s cooldown) Enemies that walk into it take damage every 0.4s.
Condense Arrow Storm into a single ray that damages enemies 10 times per second
Triples Main Attack arrows but they deal -10% of normal Main Attack arrow damage.
Hitting an enemy will give you a brief buff of +3% Walk Speed. (Max +70%) -10% of the bonus decays every second.
Your Arrow Shield arrows turn into sentient bows that attack nearby enemies up to 8 times each. (Arrow Shield will no longer knock mobs away)
When you hit the ground with Arrow Bomb, leave a Trap that damages enemies. (Max 2 Traps)
When hitting an aggressive enemy 5+ blocks away, gain +1 Focus. (Max 3, 1.1s cooldown, Focus resets if you miss once, +15% damage bonus per focus)

Arrow Storm will shoot +1 stream of arrows and +2 extra arrows per stream. 
Arrow storm gains recoil while midair.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm by 5.
Arrow bomb pulls enemies towards you. If a trap is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead. Increase Heart Shatter's damage.
Gives Arrow Shield and Guardian Angels +2 extra charges. Reduces Guardian Angels' damage.
Your Traps will deal +20% more damage for every second it's active. (Max +100%)
When casting Escape, throw a hook that pulls you when hitting a block. If you hit an enemy, pull them towards you instead. (Escape will not throw you backward anymore)
Increase your maximum Focus by +2.
Phantom Ray gains extra forward range, and becomes wider.
Windy Feet will last longer and grant a stronger speed buff. (+20% speed, +60s)
Arrow Shield summons a Hound that will attack aggressive enemies every 0.25s and drag them towards your traps.
Leap forward when you double jump. (4s Cooldown)
For every 1% Walk Speed you have from items, gain +1 Raw Spell Damage (Max 100).
Arrow Bomb will bounce once when hitting a block or enemy.
Bryophyte Roots summons a Snake after disappearing that will spit weakening venom at aggressive enemies. (Max 1) Enemies will be weakened for 1.5s.
When you have 2+ Focus, holding shift will summon the Twain's Arc. Charge it up to shoot a destructive long-range beam. (Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)
Arrow Bomb's recoil is increased and it's self-damage is reduced to 5%.
Fire Creep becomes much stronger.
Increase the maximum amount of active Traps you can have by +3.
Increase the damage of Arrow Bomb.
When using Escape, hold shift to quickly drop down and deal damage.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield by 5.
Arrow Shield's radius, knockback, and damage is increased. Guardian Angels' damage is increased.
Arrow Bomb will be unaffected by gravity and increase its explosion damage.
Reduce leap's cooldown by 1s.
Your Main Attack arrows will follow nearby enemies and be unaffected by gravity.
Your Traps will give you 0.5 Mana per second and 10 Mana when they explode. Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm by 5.
If you do not damage an enemy for 4s or more, your next sucessful hit will deal +60% damage and add +1 Focus.
Your Guardian Angels gain increased range and can shoot +4 extra arrows before disappearing.
When casting Escape, release 100 arrows towards the ground.
Basaltic Trap summons a Crow upon detonation that will peck at aggressive enemies every 0.9s. (Max 2) Enemies will be distracted for 0.2s.
Phantom Ray will increase its damage by 10% everytime you do not miss with it. (Max 70%)
Slow Falling is applied upon using Escape. Crouching at any point will cancel this effect.
Twain's Arc can now pierce through up to 5 enemies, dealing reduced damage after piercing. (Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)
When any of your projectiles miss, gain +0.08 Mana.
Arrow Bomb's explosion will fling 25 shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area.
Reduce the Mana cost of Escape by 5.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield by 5.
Increase your Grappling Hook's range, speed and strength.
Shocking Bomb will temporarily shock enemies reducing their defences. (12s cooldown)

Arrow Storm will shoot +2 extra streams of arrows.
Arrow Storm's recoil is doubled.
Your Traps will be connected by a rope that deals damage to enemies every 0.2s. Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
Increase your maximum Snakes by +1. Increase your maximum Crows by +2. Increase the damage of your Hound.

If you have 5+ Focus, casting Arrow Storm while 4+ blocks above the ground cause you to levitate and shoot 20 homing arrows per second until you run out of Focus. While in this state, you will lose 1 Focus per second.

Attach an icy snare to Basaltic Trap, drastically inhibiting and damaging nearby enemies every 0.2s after it detonates.
Increase your maximum traps by +1.
Your bows from Guardian Angels become all-seeing, increasing their range, damage and letting them shoot up to +4 times each.

Increase Patient Hunter's damage gain per second by +10% and add increase its Max Damage by +100%.
Increase your maximum traps by +1.
Enemies near you will be slowed down.
Add +2 max Focus.
While mid-air after using Escape, Twain's Arc will fire immediately upon using your Main Attack.
If you do not get hit for 4+ seconds, become immune to self-damage and Arrow Storm's loses its recoil. (Dodging counts as not getting hit)
Fierce Stomp will create geysers, dealing more damage and pushing enemies away vertically.
Arrow bomb will throw 2 additional smaller bombs when exploding.
Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb by 5.

Warrior.desc: Violently bash the ground, dealing high damage in a large area
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range w/ spear
Reduce the Mana cost of Bash by 10.
Bash will hit a second time at a farther range
Charge forward at high speed (hold shift to cancel)
After using Charge, violently crash down into the ground and deal damage
For every 1% or 1 Raw Main Attack Damage you have from items, gain +2% Walk Speed (Max 20%)
Harden your skin and become permanently +5% more resistant. For every 1% or 1 Raw Heath Regen you have from items, gain +10 Health (Max 100)
Rocket enemies in the air and deal massive damage
Reduce the Mana cost of Charge by 5.
Emit a terrorizing roar that deals damage, pull nearby enemies, and add damage resistance to yourself and allies
Increases base damage from all Earth attacks
Increases base damage from all Thunder attacks
Increases base damage from all Water attacks
Increases base damage from all Air attacks
Increases base damage from all Fire attacks
Bash will hit 4 times at an even larger range
Mobs hit by Uppercut will explode mid-air and receive additional damage
Uppercut will deal a footsweep attack at a longer and wider angle. Reduces the Mana cost of Uppercut by 5.
Damage enemies in your way when using Charge
Uppercut will light mobs on fire, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds
War Scream and Air Shout will deal more damage.
After casting 3 different spells in a row, your next spell will cost 1 mana
War Scream will fire a projectile that can go through walls and deal damage multiple times
When casting War Scream, create a holy shield around you that reduces all incoming damage by 70% for 3 hits. (25s cooldown)
After casting War Scream, become Corrupted (10s Cooldown). You cannot heal while in that state. While Corrupted, every 2% of Health you lose will add +4 Raw Damage to your attacks (Max 120)
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range w/ spear
Reduce the Mana Cost of Uppercut by 5.
During Charge, you can steer and change direction
Gain a 30% chance to take no damage and instantly attack back when dodging an enemy attack with Agility.
If you receive a hit that's less than 5% of your max HP, gain 10 Mana (1s Cooldown)

If you do not have enough mana to cast a spell, spend health instead (0.35% health per mana).
Spells cast using health instead of mana will deal +15% damage.
When using Charge, mobs hit will halt your momentum and get knocked back
Add +2 additional charges to Mantle of the Bovemists. Reduce its cooldown by 5s.

Gain the ability to unleash a Sacred Surge. Whenever any of your spells or abilities are triggered, increase your holy power by 1%. Bash and Uppercut will spend 25% of Sacred Surge to smite enemies with holy energy, dealing extra damage.
War Scream grants players +8% damage bonus & +5% resistance.
While Corrupted, every 1% of Health you lose will increase your damage by +1.5% (Max 80%)
Increase your chance to attack with Counter by +30%
After leaving Corrupted, Restore 30% of your Corrupted bar as max health.
Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream by 5.
Charge will cleanse you of all negative effects and fire, as well as any allies you pass through. (3s Cooldown)
Increase the damage of Bash
Bash leaves a trail of boiling blood behind its first explosion, slowing down and damaging enemies above it every 0.4 seconds
After leaving Corrupted, gain 5% of the health lost back for each enemy killed while Corrupted
After being hit by Fireworks, enemies will crash into the ground and receive more damage
Mobs thrown into walls from Flying Kick will explode and receive additonal damage
Regain back 30% of the damage you take as healing over 15s.
Reduce the cooldown of Bak'al's Grasp by -5s, and increase the raw damage gained for every 2% of health lost by +1
For every 4% Reflection you have from items, gain +1/5s Mana Regen (Max 10/5s)
Uppercut will create a strong gust of air, launching you upward with enemies (Hold shift to stay grounded)
Gain +5% Base Resistance and become immune to knockback
While Corrupted, losing 30% Health will make your next Uppercut destroy enemies' defense, rendering them weaker to damage
When your Mantle of the Bovemist loses all charges, deal damage around you for each Mantle individually lost
Your Main Attacks are empowered while you have at least 10% holy power, dealing +40% damage and having +25% range.
Everytime you heal 5% of your max health, deal damage to all nearby enemies
While Corrupted, every 3% Health you lose will add +1 AoE to Bash (Max 10)
War Scream will ripple the ground and deal damage 3 times in a large area
Reduce the Mana cost of Charge by 5 and increase your Walk Speed by +20%
Mobs damaged by War Scream will target only you for at least 8s (10s cooldown). Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream by 5.
While Corrupted, hitting an enemy with your Main Attack will add +4% to your Corrupted bar. (Cooldown: 2s)
Increase the damage of Uppercut, but also increase its mana cost
Bash will buff your allies' positive IDs. (15s Cooldown)
Reduce the Mana cost of Bash by 5.
Reduce the Mana cost of War Scream by 5.
Increases the cap of Enraged Blow by +50%.

Damaging enemies will inflict them with +5 Discombobulated (Max 150). You will deal +1 neutral and elemental damage to enemies for every Discombobulated they have. -5 of the bonus decays every second.

Bash will cast at the player's position and gain additional AoE.
Bash will be cast twice as fast.
After casting War Scream, envelop yourself with a vortex that damages nearby enemies every 0.5s
Increases the damage of Sacred Surge
Casting War Scream with at least 25% Holy Power will spend all of it to grant +1% Overhealth for each point of Holy Power.
If your health is 25% full or less, gain +40% Resistance
After leaving corrupting, annihilate all enemies around you, for every 1% Corrupted you had, damage increases by 5%
Reduce the Mana cost of Uppercut by 5.
When you receive a fatal blow, survive and regain 30% of your health. Makes all nearby allies invincible for 3s (10m Cooldown).
Reduce Blood Pact's health cost. (0.25% health per mana)

Mage.desc: Summons a slow but powerful meteor from the sky, dealing massive damage over a large area.
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a wand.
Reduce the Mana cost of Meteor by 10.
Drastically increase the speed of your Meteor ability.
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a wand.
Instantly teleport in the direction you're facing
For every 2% or 2 Raw Spell Damage you have from items, gain +1/5s mana regen (Max 5/5s)
Heal yourself and nearby allies in a large area around you. (When healing an ally, you can't heal more than 30% of their max health)
Reduce the Mana cost of Teleport by 5.
Summon a fast-moving ice snake that reduces your enemies' speed and damage them.
Increases base damage from all Air attacks
Increases your base damage from all Thunder attacks
Increases your base damage from all Water attacks
Increases base damage from all Fire attacks
Increases your base damage from all Earth attacks
When using Teleport, slash through the air and deal damage to enemies you pierce.
After casting Meteor, summon 3 lightning strikes and deal additional damage.
Meteor and Ophanim will leave a sigil of fire on the ground that damages enemies every 0.4s.
Heal emits a strong light, damaging nearby enemies. Arcane Transfer will damage nearby enemies when transferring 30+ Mana.
Increase the damage of Meteor.
Your Main Attack will add +1 Winded to enemies you hit. (Max 10, 0.2s cooldown) Ice Snake will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have. Winded will decay once every 5s.
When casting Meteor, instead summon 2 orbs of light with 200 Health that will attack when you use your Main Attack. When they damage an enemy, they lose 20% of their Health. They can be healed back.
Meteor, Ice Snake and Wind Slash will add +7 Mana to a Mana Bank for every aggressive enemy you hit. Heal will now transfer the content of your Mana Bank into usable Mana instead of healing.
Reduce the Mana cost of Heal by 5.
Heal and Arcane Transfer will purify you of all negative effects and fire. (3s Cooldown)
Ice Snake will follow the direction you're facing, allowing you to control it.
Teleport will blind enemies, confusing them for a brief period of time.
Meteor and Ophanim will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have.
Increase your Heal's range.
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Reduce the Mana cost of Ice Snake by 5.
Healing 120% of your max health within 10s will apply a damage bonus to every player you've healed. (15s Cooldown)
Reduce the Mana cost of Teleport by 5.
When your Mana Bank reaches 30, your Main Attack will explode upon impact with enemies. (Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)
Teleport will trigger 2 times in quick succession.
Ice Snake will leave a sigil of ice beneath you that slows and damages enemies every 0.8s. Allies standing on the sigil will be immune to knockback.
Increases the health of Ophanim's orbs by +800 and reduces the damage they take when attacking by -5%.
Ice Snake will summon 3 snakes.
For every 5/3s Lifesteal you have from items, gain 1% Spell Damage (Max 50%)
Teleport will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have.
For every 1% Water Damage Bonus you have, buff Heal's healing power by +0.3%.
Heal will trigger 2 more times, increasing your overall healing.
Pyrokinesis will add +1 Mana every 0.25s to your Mana Bank when hitting an aggressive enemy. (Duration: 2.5s)
Increase the damage of Ophanim.
If you kill an enemy with Winded on them, the leftover Winded will spread to other nearby foes. (Max 10)
Healing 50% of your max health within 10s will summon a rotating orb that damages enemies upon contact. (Max 3 Orbs)
You gain an 80% walk speed buff for 4s after casting Heal or Arcane Transfer. (8s cooldown)
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Increase your maximum Winded by +10.
Meteor will launch directly from you as a slow projectile.
Reduce the Mana cost of Ice Snake by 5.
Deal Damage in an area on the location you Teleport to.
Reduce the Mana cost of Meteor by 5.
When your Mana Bank reaches 120, casting Arcane Transfer will rapidly unleash the last 3 spells you've cast in order.
Creates an area of effect when sprinting that increases the walk speed of all allies the longer they run in it. (Step out or stop running to cancel)
Ice Snake will add +1 Winded to enemies and deal more damage.
Increase your maximum orbs from Ophanim by +1.
Ice Snake will freeze enemies for 2s.
Increase the damage of Sunshower.
Meteor, Ice Snake and Wind Slash will add +3 Mana to your Mana Bank for each aggressive mob you hit.
Increase your maximum Winded by +10.
Enemies will deal -0.5% damage for every Winded they have.
Increase the health of your orbs from Ophanim by +3000.
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Increase your maximum orbs from Ophanim by +3 and reduce their damage.

Healing 250% of your max health within 10s will make your next heal activate Sunflare. While Sunflare is active, you will restore health and mana to all nearby allies, and your Ophanim orbs will attack constantly.
Increase your Max Orbs from Lightweaver by +2.
Arcane Transfer will allow you to overflow your mana over its maximum limits. (Max 300)

Holding shift and casting Heal will absorb all Winded on nearby enemies and make you Timelocked. While Timelocked, your mana will not be depleted and you become immovable from external forces. All enemies will receive damage as if they had the amount of Winded you absorbed. (Max 60)
Reduce the Mana cost of Heal by 5.
If you have more than 100 Mana, casting a spell will give you +5 mana over 2s.
Chaos Explosion will cast +2 spells.

Assassin.desc: Slash rapidly around you, damaging enemies in a large area.
Increase your speed by +5% and improve your Main Attack's damage when using a dagger.
Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack by 10.
Spin Attack will activate a second time with a larger area of effect.
For every 2% or 2 Raw Main Attack Damage you have from items, gain +5/3s Poison Damage (Max 50/3s). Your Main Attack gains additional range (+1 Block).
Dash in the direction you're facing.
Your Main Attack will attack twice, but deal -40% damage per hit.
Throw a bomb that slowly emits smoke, damaging all enemies in it every 0.5s.
Reduce the Mana cost of Dash by 5.
Unleash a rapid flurry of 8 hits to enemies facing you, dealing heavy damage.
Increases base damage from all Earth attacks
Increases base damage from all Thunder attacks
Increases base damage from all Fire attacks
Increases base damage from all Water attacks
Increases base damage from all Air attacks
Makes Multihit a single devastating hit. If you strike an enemy from behind, it deals double the damage. Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit by 5.
Falling 8 blocks or more deals damage around you when you land, and is increased by +10% damage per block over 8, up to 12 additional blocks.
Multihit's damage ramps up every hit, dealing additional damage. Damage bonus caps at 8 hits.
Dash will vanish you into the shadows. You cannot heal or gain mana while in this state. (Attack or get hit to cancel)
Smoke Bomb will stick to enemies and deal additional damage
When you hold shift while airborne, slowly glide and become immune to fall damage. (Max 5s)
Your first hit after casting Vanish will deal +80% more damage.
Summon 3 Clones after reappearing from Vanish that will follow and protect you. When hit, you take 60% less damage. Clones can take 2 hits before dying.
Spin Attack will lunge you forward, deal 3 strikes and lunge you upward.
Resets Vanish's cooldown after killing an enemy.
Smoke Bomb will throw +2 bombs.
Increase Smoke Bomb's range and area of effect.
Increases your Walk Speed by +120% when in Vanish.
Increase your Main Attack's range and add +5 raw damage to all attacks
Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit by 5.
Reduces Vanish's cooldown by -1.75s after striking an enemy from behind with Backstab.
When losing a Clone, it will cast Spin Attack before dying
Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb by 5.
Spin Attack and Lacarate will blind enemies and deal additional damage
You gain +1.2 Mana if you hit an enemy while airborne. (1.25+ blocks off the ground to be airborne)
Smoke Bomb will pull nearby enemies.
Anytime you get hit for less than 5% of your max hp, reduce your abilities cooldown by -3s. (1s Cooldown)
When you double tap jump, leap forward. (2s Cooldown)
Deal damage to mobs you Dash through. After using Swan Dive, your next Dash deals additional damage. Hitting an enemy will vault you upwards and reset Dash.
Dealing over 1.5x of your max health as damage in a single hit will deal 30% of the damage to other nearby enemies.
While you're inside Smoke Bomb, increase your damage by +25% and gain Luring for 20s
Increases Multihit's amount of hits & Finality's damage cap by +3
Smoke Bomb will add +1 Mark to enemies it hits. (Max 4, 0.1s Cooldown) Marked enemies will take +7% damage for each mark they have.
Your Clones will mimic your spells and abilities, but you deal -20% damage for every clone that's alive. Bamboozle becomes significantly stronger.
After using Dash, you prepare 3 shurikens. Your next Main Attack will throw all prepared shurikens.
Increase the range of Multihit
Increase your Walk Speed by +20% and your Jump Height by +1
Increase Surprise Strike's damage by +40%
Reduce the Mana cost of Dash by 5.
Hitting an enemy with Swan Dive or an empowered Dash gives you a +35% damage boost for 7.5s.
Reduce the Mana cost of Spin Attack by 5.
After leaving Vanish, pull all nearby Marked mobs towards where you entered Vanish.
Reduce the Mana cost of Multihit by 5.

When hitting enemies with Spin Attack, reduce the duration of your negative effects by 30% per hit and transfer them onto enemies. Lure can be transferred to most enemies. (Bosses and special enemies are immune)
Smoke Bomb will slow down enemies while in the smoke
Reduce Hop's cooldown by -1s. Using Hop into a wall will bounce you backward. (Hold shift to cancel)
Increases Spin Attack and Lacerate's range and damage, and adds +1 Mark to enemies hit.
Lacerate will deal +1 slash
Increases Violent Vortex's damage by +40% and increases the damage requirement to be 2.5x your max health.
After killing an enemy, gain +5 Mana for each leftover Mark it had.
Reduce the Mana cost of Smoke Bomb by 5.
Multihit gains extra damage and can be aimed in all directions
Add +2 max Marks
Improves your damage by +5% per Clone while your Clones are active, and reduce their maximum damage penalty by 5%.
Your Shurikens will bounce 2 times between enemies upon impact.
If an enemy has 4+ Marks, your next Multihit or Powder Special will deal +100% damage. (15s Cooldown, per enemy)
Summon +3 additional Clones. Improve your damage by +5% per Clone While your Clones are active, and reduce their maximum damage penalty by 5%. (Cooldown: 15s)
Grant allies within 16 blocks +10% Overhealth whenever you hit a Lured enemy. (9s Cooldown) Overhealth decays over 10s.

After spending 40 Mana or gaining 3 Momentum, an area underneath you blooms and damages enemies below it every 0.3s. The duration is reset and the radius is increased after every bloom. (Max 10 blocks)
Harvester will give +5 Mana
Increase Marked's damage bonus by +4%
When Clones are active, casting Multihit while holding shift will instead slay 1 Clone and teleport you forwards with a brutal fiery slash.
When hitting enemies, reduce their damage by -0.1% per hit. (Max -15%) The damage debuff decays at -0.3% per second.

If cast while in Vanish, Spin Attack will consume all Marks from nearby enemies to summon the Nightcloak Knife.
 The Knife will copy your attacks on enemies near you, dealing 9% of your damage for every 2 Mark consumed. (Max 10 Marks)
When entering and exiting Vanish, become immune to knockback and gain resistance for a brief moment.

Landing 30 hits against an enemy while mid-air grants you +1 Momentum (Max 5). Stomp consumes Momentum for +25% damage per stack. At 1 Momentum, Stomp releases an explosion & Dash's downward velocity increases.
Reduce your maximum damage penalty by -5% while your Clones are active.

Shaman.desc: Summon a totem that damages enemies around it every 0.4s.
Double your Main Attack's beam speed and increase your damage when using a reik.
Reduce the Mana cost of Totem by 10.
Your Totem will deal damage where it lands.
Reduce your Main Attack's spread, and increase its beam speed by +33%.
Leap towards your Totem.
Your Main Attack will throw +2 beams.
Throw a rapid projectile that will explode and knock enemies away. (Hold shift to pull instead)
Reduce the Mana cost of Haul by 5.
Emit an aura from your Totem that damages enemies.
Casting Totem while looking at an existing Totem will instead shove it forwards, dealing damage to any enemy it crashes into.
Increases your base damage from all Earth attacks.
Increases your base damage from all Air attacks.
Increases your base damage from all Water attacks.
Increases base damage from all Thunder attacks.
Increases base damage from all Fire attacks.
When hitting the ground after using Haul, deal damage around you.
Increases Uproot and Haunting Memory's range. Hitting Totem with either will reset its duration.
While mid-air, your Totem will leave a streak of rain that damages enemies under it every 0.4s.
Aura will travel at a much greater speed and deal additional damage.
Uproot will not explode or knockback enemies, but will deal damage 3 times.
Your Totem will summon 1 Puppet every 3s (Max 3). They throw knives at nearby enemies every 0.5s.
When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Lunatic. While wearing this mask, the mana cost of Aura is decreased and you gain damage bonus at the cost of reduced resistance.
Your Totem will siphon 2% of your health every 0.4s and transfer it into a Blood Pool. Aura will use 15% of your Blood Pool to deal +35% damage and heal all allies.
Enemies hit by Nature's Jolt will be slowed down by 40%.
Reduce the Mana cost of Aura by 5.
Reduce the Mana cost of Uproot by 5.
Once Aura reaches its maximum range, it will bounce back and deal its effects a second time.
Increase your Max Puppets by +1.
When you switch Masks, throw your previous one forwards. If it hits an enemy, it will attach for a short time and debuff them. You will not receive the effects of your Mask until it returns.
Increase your Totem's area of effect.
If you are outside your Totem's range, Haul will teleport you to it.
When your Puppets have 3s duration left, they will run towards enemies at high speed to explode and deal damage.
When wearing the Mask of the Lunatic, killing an enemy with Aura will cast a new Aura at its location, dealing -50% of its damage.
Increase your maximum Blood pool by +30 Points.
Hitting enemies with Uproot will make your Summons focus them and deal additional damage.
Increase your Max Puppets by +2.
When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Fanatic. While wearing this mask, the mana cost of Totem is decreased and you gain resistance at the cost of reduced walk speed.
Flaming Tongue gets +1 hit, and now inflicts enemies with Bleeding for +1.5s per hit. Haunting Memory will instead inflict +3s of Bleeding. Bleeding enemies take damage every 0.5s. (Maximum 6s)
Your Totem will give all players bonus to yourself and allies standing inside its range.
After switching from a Mask to another 2 times, gain 30 mana.
Increase your maximum Totem by +1 and reduce Totem and Aura's damage.
Reduce the Mana cost of Totem by 5.
Enemies hit by Aura will be pulled towards your totem.
Every 0.4s your Totem will heal every player within its range.
Reduce the Mana cost of Haul by 5.
Reduce the Mana cost of Aura by 5.
Increase Totem's damage.
Nearby Bleeding enemies will take damage for every 2% health you lose.
While wearing the Mask of the Fanatic, your Totem will shatter upon impacting the ground, rapidly triggering 8s worth of its effects. Regeneration will only heal 50% of its usual amount.
Masquerade will need -1 Mask switch to trigger. Reduce the mana given by -10.
Hitting your Totem with Uproot will summon an Effigy that will attack enemies and push them towards your totem.
When casting Uproot, instead wear the Mask of the Heretic. While wearing this mask, the mana cost of Haul is reduced and you gain walk speed at the cost of reduced damage.

Casting Totem while holding shift will spend 30 Blood Pool per Totem to set all Totem durations to 8s, fabricating 4 tentacles that strike and apply +40% slowness and +20% vulnerability. Bleeding enemies will take x2 damage from the tentacles.
For every 1% Water Damage you have from items, buff Aura's healing power by +0.3%.
Increase your maximum Blood pool by +30 Points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by 1.5s.
Uproot will slow down enemies.
When switching to the Mask of the Heretic, you and nearby allies gain +60% walk speed. -15% of the bonus decays every second.
Increases Bleeding damage.
When yourself or an ally gets hit while standing in your Totem's range, add 35% of the damage taken into your Blood Pool. (Max 10 Points per hit.)
Greatly reduce Main Attack spread. Your Main Attack will now inflict enemies with Bleeding for +0.25s per beam.
Hitting your Puppets with Main Attack will cause them to lose 2s of their duration per beam.
When switching to Mask of the Fanatic, temporarily give massive resistance to yourself and allies (8s cooldown).
Increase Twisted Tether's damage.
Increase your maximum Totem by +1 and reduce Totem and Aura's damage.
Aura will temporarily increase your Summon's attack speed by +30%. Players hit will gain +5 mana.

properties.TODO: Make this not multiply base damage...

Shaman.desc: When wearing the Mask of the Heretic, your Totem will move towards you, unless you are within its range.
When wearing the Mask of the Heretic, Haul will make you bounce off the ground 3 times at increasing speed and deal damage to nearby enemies.
When switching to Mask of the Lunatic, reduce the defenses of nearby enemies. (8s Cooldown)
Increase your maximum Blood pool by +30 Points. Increase your maximum Bleeding duration by 1.5s.
When you or your Summons kill an enemy, gain +1 Max Puppets for 15s. (Max +8)
Casting Uproot while holding shift will rally all puppets, giving them +25% attack speed and improved accuracy. Main attack deals +3% more damage per rallied puppet.
Your Hummingbirds' passive effects are improved. +20% walk speed and +2 jump height.

Summon 2 Hummingbird Carvings which fly around you, passively granting a walk speed buff. Casting Haul while holding shift will temporarily send your Hummingbirds to attack nearby enemes, rapidly piercing through them every 0.25s. Casting it again will call them back early. While they are attacking, your Hummingbirds will not apply their passive effects to you. (Duration: 10s)

After saving 150 Mana from your Masks' mana reductions, casting Uproot will make you wear the Mask of the Awakened for 25s, giving the power of all Masks at once without any downsides. Switcing to an attached Mask while Awakened will immediately recall the Mask back to you.

Uproot or Haunting Memory will use 70% of your Blood Pool to cast a destructive beam that damages enemies every 0.2s. You cannot attack while in that state. Yourself and allies will receive +2% health as extra overflowing health instead. Decay -1.5% of the bonus health every second.
Reduce the Mana cost of Uproot by 5.
